column5: Dang..  https://www.thefishinhole.com/index.cfm?ima...CTSBYCLASSG=10C  http://setthehook.com/fishlocators/aquavu/Shdwn-homepage.jpg
Gee..tough question eh?
Ice fishing "gadgets".  Having Ron along to cook our lunches !
The best one ever invented................................................... The heated, gas motor driven portable ice hut!!!
I'd have to say my showdown,clam hut,izumi rod, big buddy heater and a chubby darter is all i needs,,,ohh ya,,,and ice!!
I like your style drifter!
I like the Windlass Tip Up. I have used them for about 22 years, and like to counterbalance them as well as incorporate plastic washers onto the spool as a drag mechanism.
AQUA VU!    It tells ya exactly what you are unable to catch!!  RFS
Gadgets.. heck I just bought an ice auger and thought that was a major advantage to the "hatchet" method.
I've been there too Rich!
For Whiteouts..
for camp outs...
Free Parking
maybe a Neon is the best thing to take on the ice?!?!?!
Makes me want to own a Tow Truck  !  $$$ !!
For Rhybak..

Gotta be a GPS . Can take me back to my same hole in the middle off butt %&$^ nowhere...  It has also helped me come back to shore when the weather got so bad that i couldnt see 2 feet infront of the sled ..
the new Micro fin-bore 6" AUGER folds down and can fit in a pack-sak.  For where we go, its priceless!
Me too! I bought one in 2006, and it cuts ice like butter. Here are a couple pics..
Like Dave, I like the SnoBear idea as well, just can't afford one.

A good bucket to sit on is at the top of my list... you can fit rods/reels, lures gloves, whatever you need pretty much in there, and you always have somewhere to put you're catch and best of all it can be used as a seat!!!
